data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simões, Felipe Lorenz, Campos, Luiz Alexandre (2014): Taxonomic notes on Ochlerus: revisiting Herrich-Schäffer's species (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Discocephalinae: Ochlerini). Zootaxa 3774 (5): 496-500, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.5.8
